content:
Yes, there are several tours and itineraries available for visiting all the major tourist attractions in Quezon City. Some of the popular ones include:

1. Quezon City Day Tour - This tour covers all the major attractions in Quezon City such as the Quezon Memorial Circle, Ninoy Aquino Parks and Wildlife Center, UP Diliman, and more.

2. Art in Island Museum Tour - This tour takes you to the Art in Island Museum, one of the most popular attractions in Quezon City, where you can take pictures with 3D paintings and optical illusions.

3. Kalye Artisano Tour - This tour takes you to the artsy side of Quezon City, showcasing its street art scene and artisanal markets.

4. Food Trip Tour - Quezon City is known for its food scene, and this tour takes you to some of the best restaurants and street food stalls in the city.

5. Nightlife Tour - This tour takes you to the hip and happening nightlife spots in Quezon City, such as Tomas Morato and Timog Avenue.

You can easily book these tours online or with a local travel agency.
